Class Registry

java.lang.Object
  Registry

public class Registry
extends java.lang.Object

Registry used to store all servers that that are currently available.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Norfavrell

Method Detail

restore

public int restore(java.io.File file)
Attempt to restore registry from file. Current registry will not be cleared. Any entries will not be overwritten.

Parameters:
file - File from which registry should be restored.
Returns:
Number of restored entries or -1 on error.

restore

public int restore(java.io.File file,
                   boolean overwrite)
Attempt to restore registry from file. Current registry will not be cleared.

Parameters:
file - File from which registry should be restored.
overwrite - Indicates weather entries should be overwritten if already in registry.
Returns:
Number of restored entries or -1 on error.

restore

public int restore(java.io.File file,
                   boolean clear,
                   boolean overwrite)
Attempt to restore registry from file.

Parameters:
file - File from which registry should be restored.
clear - Indicates weather current registry should be cleared before attepting restoration.
overwrite - Indicates weather entries should be overwritten if already in registry.
Returns:
Number of restored entries or -1 on error.

backup

public int backup(java.io.File file)
Backups entries to file for later restoration. File will be cleared before processing.

Parameters:
file - File to which entries should be written to.
Returns:
Number of written entries or -1 on error.

backup

public int backup(java.io.File file,
                  boolean clear)
Backups entries to file for later restoration.
WARNING If clear is set to true, overwrite parameter parameter for restore should also be true.

Parameters:
file - File to which entries should be written to.
clear - Indicates weather clear file before backupping.
Returns:
Number of written entries or -1 on error.

add

public boolean add(Server server)
Add server to server list. Record will not be overwritten!

Parameters:
server - Server that has to be added.
Returns:
true if server was added successfully or false in other case.

add

public boolean add(Server server,
                   boolean overwrite)
Add server to server list.

Parameters:
server - Server that has to be added.
overwrite - Indicates weather record should be overwritten if it already exists in server list.
Returns:
true if server was added successfully or false in other case.
